languages.text: {n}Ризза явно старается отшутиться от вашего вопроса, но ее тревожность можно понять — обстановка на станции не способствует душевному спокойствию ее жителей, особенно связанных с незаконными делишками.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ризза явно старается отшутиться от вашего вопроса, но ее тревожность можно понять — обстановка на станции не способствует душевному спокойствию ее жителей, особенно связанных с незаконными делишками.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ryzza is clearly trying to turn your question into a joke, but her anxiety is understandable. The situation on the station is not helping to set its inhabitants' minds at ease — especially those involved in illicit activities.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ризза явно старается отшутиться от вашего вопроса, но ее тревожность можно понять — обстановка на станции не способствует душевному спокойствию ее жителей, особенно связанных с незаконными делишками.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza is clearly trying to turn your question into a joke, but her anxiety is understandable. The state of affairs on Footfall isn't conductive to its inhabitants' mental comfort — particularly those who are involved in illicit business.{/n}

{n}Ryzza is clearly trying to turn your question into a joke, but her anxiety is understandable. The state of affairs on Footfall isn't conductive to its inhabitants' mental comfort — particularly those who are involved in illicit business.{/n}

{n}Ryzza is clearly trying to turn your question into a joke, but her anxiety is understandable. The situation at the station does not contribute to the peace of mind of its inhabitants — especially those associated with illicit business.{/n}

{n}Ryzza is clearly trying to turn your question into a joke, but her anxiety is understandable. The situation on the station is not helping to set its inhabitants' minds at ease — especially those involved in illicit activities.{/n}

languages.text: {n}很显然，莱萨想以玩笑的方式来回答你的问题，但她的焦虑心情你可以理解。舰站此刻的情况令人忧心忡忡，尤其是那些和非法交易有瓜葛的人们。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza is clearly trying to turn your question into a joke, but her anxiety is understandable. The situation on the station is not helping to set its inhabitants' minds at ease — especially those involved in illicit activities.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}很显然，莱萨想以玩笑的方式来回答你的问题，但她的焦虑心情你可以理解。舰站此刻的情况并不利于居民安定生活，尤其是那些和非法交易有瓜葛的居民。{/n}

languages.text: {n}リザは分かりやすくこちらの質問に冗談で返そうとしているが、不安な気持ちを隠しきれていない。今のステーションは、到底住人が落ち着けるとは言えない状況だ…特に、闇のビジネスに手を染める者にとっては。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza is clearly trying to turn your question into a joke, but her anxiety is understandable. The situation on the station is not helping to set its inhabitants' minds at ease — especially those involved in illicit activities.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}リザは分かりやすくこちらの質問に冗談で返そうとしているが、不安な気持ちを隠しきれていない。今のステーションは、到底住人が落ち着けるとは言えない状況だ…特に、闇のビジネスに手を染める者にとっては。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ryzza intenta hacer de tu pregunta una broma, pero su ansiedad es evidente. La situación en la estación no contribuye a la tranquilidad de sus habitantes, especialmente si están involucrados en negocios ilícitos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza is clearly trying to turn your question into a joke, but her anxiety is understandable. The situation on the station is not helping to set its inhabitants' minds at ease — especially those involved in illicit activities.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza intenta hacer de tu pregunta una broma, pero su ansiedad es evidente. La situación en la estación no contribuye a la tranquilidad de sus habitantes, especialmente los relacionados con los negocios ilícitos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ryzza versucht ganz offensichtlich, einen Witz aus deiner Frage zu machen, doch ihre Unruhe ist verständlich. Die Situation auf der Station trägt nicht zur Beruhigung ihrer Bewohner bei ... vor allem, wenn sie an illegalen Aktivitäten beteiligt sind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza is clearly trying to turn your question into a joke, but her anxiety is understandable. The situation on the station is not helping to set its inhabitants' minds at ease — especially those involved in illicit activities.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza versucht ganz offensichtlich, einen Witz aus deiner Frage zu machen, doch ihre Unruhe ist verständlich. Die Situation auf der Station trägt nicht zum Seelenfrieden der Bewohner bei, vor allem jener, die mit illegalen Geschäften in Verbindung stehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ryzza tente clairement de tourner votre question en plaisanterie, mais son anxiété est compréhensible : la situation de la station ne contribue pas à la tranquillité de ses habitants, surtout ceux qui s'adonnent à des activités illicites.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza is clearly trying to turn your question into a joke, but her anxiety is understandable. The situation on the station is not helping to set its inhabitants' minds at ease — especially those involved in illicit activities.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza tente clairement de tourner votre question en plaisanterie, mais son anxiété est compréhensible : la situation de la station ne contribue pas à la tranquillité de ses habitants, surtout ceux qui trempent dans des affaires louches.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ryzza, sorduğun soruyu şakaya vurmaya çalışsa da gerginliğini gizleyemiyor. İstasyonun vaziyeti, yasa dışı işler çevirenler başta olmak üzere burada yaşayan insanların endişelerini harlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza is clearly trying to turn your question into a joke, but her anxiety is understandable. The situation on the station is not helping to set its inhabitants' minds at ease — especially those involved in illicit activities.{/n}
